content.html: I'm sorry to hear that someone has violated the Code of Conduct. However, surely voicing legitimate concerns over the safety of an event does not constitute harassment or abuse. Also, I am *acutely* aware of what constitutes harassment according to the CNCF CoC.
content.value: I'm sorry to hear that someone has violated the Code of Conduct. However, surely voicing legitimate concerns over the safety of an event does not constitute harassment or abuse. Also, I am *acutely* aware of what constitutes harassment according to the CNCF CoC.
